text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence President Death Seniors know you're full of Shit. Your only concern is reelection. You cannot distract from 1,683,381 Coronavirus cases and 99,332 Americans dead; collapsed economy with 3,994,000 Americans out of work; food shortages and long food lines. Still winning enough?
